Looking for a place with yummy pasta and lasagna, look no further! I was hesitant to try the lasagna because I am very picky when it comes to lasagna so I chose the ravioli stuffed with Brie and tomato and cream sauce-to die for!! Also my 9yr old daughter ordered the lasagna and loved it and I loved it as well! I'm looking forward to our next visit so I can have the lasagna all to myself! Can you believe we also got dessert with our meal! We spent $25 for all 3 of us incl coke & 3 beers! Oops, I forgot to mention the pasta is handmade!! Don't skip this place when you're in Barcelona!!
